column4: i want to get my TV card working with Ubuntu, but don't know where to start. Can anyone help?
by identifying it perhaps...          pastebin the output of lspci
miha: http://www.nomorepasting.com/getpaste.php?pasteid=24032
give me a sec to google
jami: on Windows i founbd out it was AverMedia DVB-T 771
doesnt the bttv module work for it?                sudo modprobe bttv                      and open a video capture app live tvtime to check
sudo modprobe bttv outputs nothing#
good!
open a video capture app like tvtime and check
jami: how will i know if it's working?
with some video capturing app like tvtime!!!
i have it open
doesnt it have options? i never had a tvcard on my pc to tell you how each app works
does tvtime have DVB?
i dont know
it's scanning the channels but picking nothing up
is it connected to some antenna?
yea
then i cant help more
thanks anyway
you are welcome
